import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{db}from'./firebase';import{collection,addDoc,deleteDoc,doc,onSnapshot}from'firebase/firestore';import'./App.css';// Importing the CSS file
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);const[projectName,setProjectName]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const unsubscribe=onSnapshot(collection(db,"projects"),snapshot=>{const projectList=snapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setProjects(projectList);});return()=>unsubscribe();},[]);const addProject=async()=>{if(projectName.trim()==="")return;await addDoc(collection(db,"projects"),{name:projectName});setProjectName('');};const deleteProject=async id=>{await deleteDoc(doc(db,"projects",id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Project Manager"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:projectName,onChange:e=>setProjectName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Project Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addProject,children:"Add Project"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-container",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>deleteProject(project.id),children:"X"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.name})]},project.id))})]});}export default App;
